title: SB 1.19.9-10 Part 3 | HH Stoka Krishna Swami | 10-05-2023 | Daily Evening Bhagavatam Discourse
speaker: HH Stoka Krishna Swami

segments.key_quote: Hare Krishna Hare Krishna Krishna Krishna Hare Hare Hare Rama Hare Rama Rama Rama Hare Hare
segments.summary: The lecture begins with traditional Vaishnava prayers and mantras.

segments.key_quote: That is Krishna consciousness. Situated in devotional service to Krishna, situated in bhakti, then we straight go to Krishna's personal abode for eternal life full of bliss and knowledge.
segments.summary: The speaker introduces the topic of Parikshit Maharaj's preparation for death and emphasizes the importance of Krishna consciousness for attaining eternal life.

segments.key_quote: But a pure devotee like Parikshit Maharaj has the guarantee that he is going back to Godhead.
segments.summary: The speaker contrasts the position of a pure devotee with that of materially powerful beings, highlighting the devotee's assurance of returning to Godhead.

segments.key_quote: Simply practice devotional service, become a pure devotee and go back to Godhead at the end of this very life scriptures.
segments.summary: The speaker outlines the simple method of Krishna consciousness, emphasizing chanting, hearing Srimad Bhagavatam, and following the teachings of Srila Rupa Goswami.

segments.key_quote: Let me associate with them, take their good advice and accordingly follow their instructions to prepare myself to attain self-realization.
segments.summary: The speaker recounts the story of Parikshit Maharaj being cursed and his subsequent decision to renounce his kingdom and prepare for death.

segments.key_quote: Parashara Muni was the grandson of Vasishta Muni and he is the father of Vyasadeva.
segments.summary: The speaker introduces Parashara Muni, describing his lineage and relationship to other prominent sages.

segments.key_quote: Child marriage is the most conducive for marriage...It is called as a spiritual advancement.
segments.summary: The speaker discusses the historical context of child marriage and its perceived benefits for spiritual advancement and harmonious family life.

segments.key_quote: Parashara Muni is famous for begetting Vyasa Deva.
segments.summary: The speaker continues the story of Parashara Muni, including his role in begetting Vyasadeva and his presence during Bhishma's death.
